
h1. Forum Ratings Member Actions

eXo Forum provides an intuitive rating experience that allows you to select the number of stars that represents your rating. You can rate a topic on a five-star scale: five is the highest.

Following simple guides to rate for the topic you are interested in:

*Step 1\.* Go into the topic which you want to vote.

*Step 2.* Show the *Rate this topic* form by clicking the !TopicRateButton.png! button on the topic bar. 


 !TopicRateForm.png! 

*Step 3.* Rate the topic by left clicking on the star. Click the *Cancel* button if you want to quit the *Rate this topic* form.
